quote: First smile!! An unseasonal little shower of rain fell here, and a lot of butterflies drowned, so we put them in the sun and they came back to life, and flew up and then Agaat SMILED!
quote_letters: FIRST SMILE AN UNSEASONAL LITTLE SHOWER OF RAIN FELL HERE AND A LOT OF BUTTERFLIES DROWNED SO WE PUT THEM IN THE SUN AND THEY CAME BACK TO LIFE AND FLEW UP AND THEN AGAAT SMILED
